titles.title: Right to Build Families Act of 2022
Right to Build Families Act of 2022
A bill to prohibit the limitation of access to assisted reproductive technology, and all medically necessary care surrounding such technology.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Right to Build Families Act of 2022
This bill prohibits states from prohibiting (or unreasonably limiting) access to, provision of, or insurance coverage for assisted reproductive technology (e.g., in vitro fertilization). The Department of Justice and individuals adversely affected by violations may bring a lawsuit to enforce this bill, and states are not immune from suits for violations.
